item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump says he will seek death penalty for murders in DC
item.description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday said all murder prosecutions in Washington should be capital punishment cases.

item.title: WATCH: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce announce engagement

item.title: Officer killed during police pursuit after suspect intentionally strikes him: Police
item.description: Officer Hunter Simoncic was deploying stop sticks early Tuesday when the suspect drove toward him and struck him, then continued to flee the area, pol...

item.title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce announce engagement
item.description: "Your English teacher and your gym teacher are getting married," Taylor Swift wrote in the caption of a joint Instagram post with Travis Kelce.

item.title: WATCH: Legal battle continues over Kilmar Abrego Garcia's potential deportation
item.description: ABC News’ Jack Date says the legal battle surrounding Abrego Garcia’s potential deportation will likely continue for a while.
